Package control

Class SpiderLeg

java.lang.Object
control.SpiderLeg
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExampleLeg
public abstract class SpiderLeg
extends java.lang.Object
SpiderLeg acts as an interface between Spider and the user's implementation.

    SpiderLeg()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract void conclude()
    Perform any final action or cleanup after all pages have been visited.
    abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLinks()
    Get a List of urls to add to the ongoing queue.
    abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStartPages()
    This method returns a list of page(s) to start web crawling on.
    abstract boolean handlePage​(java.lang.String url)
    This method does anything the crawler needs to do on any particular web page.
    void setOutputFolder​(java.lang.String outputFolder)
    Set the output folder for this SpiderLeg, if necessary.

    • getStartPages

      public abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStartPages()
      This method returns a list of page(s) to start web crawling on.
      Returns:
      a list of page(s) to start web crawling on.

    • handlePage

      public abstract boolean handlePage​(java.lang.String url)
      This method does anything the crawler needs to do on any particular web page.
      Parameters:
      url - The url of the web page.
      Returns:
      Whether the web page was successfully handled.

    • getLinks

      public abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLinks()
      Get a List of urls to add to the ongoing queue.
      Returns:
      A List containing zero or more urls.

    • conclude

      public abstract void conclude()
      Perform any final action or cleanup after all pages have been visited.

    • setOutputFolder

      public void setOutputFolder​(java.lang.String outputFolder)
      Set the output folder for this SpiderLeg, if necessary.
      Parameters:
      outputFolder - The folder to output any data to.
